[[Category:Items]]
__TOC__
=Description=
Skill Scrolls are consumable items dropped by Monsters. Using a Skill Scroll yields a +1.0 increase in whatever skill the scroll is labeled for and will increase your skill up to the current maximum skill cap for that skill. All Characters can increase any skill to 100 as long as they have free skill points available, and with the use of [[Power_Scrolls|Power Scrolls]] the maximum for some skill can be increased to as high as 120. Skill Scrolls with +0.1 were available for a time but these no longer drop.

==Old Scrolls==
The following skill scrolls are considered old scrolls, most of which no longer drop. Begging does still drop from [[Khaldun]] Puzzle chests. You may still come across them from time to time on the UOF Forums or at [[House_Decay|decayed houses]].

:[[File:greenSS.png]]Spirit Speak
:[[File:greenSS.png]]Animal Lore
:[[File:greenSS.png]]Fletching (Now drops with plain hue)
:[[File:plainSS.png]]Begging
:[[File:brownSS.png]]Cartography

=How to Find Scrolls=
Skill scrolls drop mainly on high-level mobs. Some examples of mobs that drop them are:
* Titans
* Liches
* Lich lords
* Balrons
* Ancient wyrms
* Evil Mage lords
* Blood elementals
* Terathan matriarchs
* Ophidian matriarchs
* Ophidian zealots
* Orc mages
* Ice elementals
* Toxic elementals
* Ratman mages
* Shadow daemons
